facts: Dark chocolate is rich in cocoa flavanols, which are plant-derived compounds with antioxidant and anti-inflammatory properties.
Studies suggest that flavanols can increase blood flow to specific regions of the brain, potentially enhancing cognitive performance.
Acute consumption may lead to short-term improvements in attention and working memory.

sources.source_title: Flavanol-rich cocoa consumption affects brain networks in healthy adults
sources.source_description: A study by American Heart Association, published in Scientific Reports, exploring the impact of flavanols on brain activity and cognitive performance.
